name: Appetizer Mobile
tagline: The premier mobile digital agency based in NYC
description:
Appetizer Mobile is an award winning digital agency offering mobile application development, consulting and marketing. We support all major platforms, including Apple iOS (iPhone, iPad, Watch, Apple TV), Google Android (Phones and Tablets), HTML5, Unity and Unreal Gaming Engines, Wearables, IOT, Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality devices. We also support Microsoft HoloLens development and AI/Deep-Learning/Machine-Learning integration.
We provide services for clients to generate new revenue channels and maximize their ROI. We are headquartered in NYC and have developed hundreds of apps for major brands, enterprises, small businesses and startups. All of our developers are in-house in our NYC office, with no outsourcing. We are experts at creating brand identity in the mobile space. We also specialize in web site development, design, ASO and optimization for mobile, tablet and PC/Mac browsing. Our apps have been featured in multiple Apple TV commercials, ranked at the top in app stores, publicized by major press outlets and highlighted by Apple in major billboard campaigns globally. Appetizer Mobile is a Forbes Agency Council approved member.
